This is an ISO file with a few other files.  (Keygenerator...install instructions.)  

Adobe Master Collection CS3 *Corporate*
---------------------------------------
1. Unzip the file

2. Either burn the ISO file to a DVD using any disk creation software you prefer,
or, mount the ISO to a virtual drive (DAEMON Tools, ect)

3. Install the applications.

4. Use the keygen to get your valid serial.

6. This is the corprate Edition and does not require activation.

5. Enjoy it!
